title: Paddle settles for $5 million over facilitating tech support scams
summary: Paddle.com and its U.S. subsidiary will pay $5 million to settle Federal Trade Commission (FTC) allegations that the company facilitated deceptive tech-support schemes that harmed many U.S. consumers, including older adults. [...]

title: Google Chrome Zero-Day CVE-2025-2783 Exploited by TaxOff to Deploy Trinper Backdoor
summary:
A now-patched security flaw in Google Chrome was exploited as a zero-day by a threat actor known as TaxOff to deploy a backdoor codenamed Trinper.

title: Scania confirms insurance claim data breach in extortion attempt
summary: Automotive giant Scania confirmed it suffered a cybersecurity incident where threat actors used compromised credentials to breach its systems and steal insurance claim documents. [...]

title: LangSmith Bug Could Expose OpenAI Keys and User Data via Malicious Agents
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed a now-patched security flaw in LangChain's LangSmith platform that could be exploited to capture sensitive data, including API keys and user prompts.

title: Instagram 'BMO' ads use AI deepfakes to scam banking customers
summary:

title: Hacker steals 1 million Cock.li user records in webmail data breach
